Please read to the very end! :)

When I discovered this app, I was quite happy. However, after downloading it, it glitched extremely bad. It wouldnâ€™t work. Iâ€™ve never left a negative review before on the app store, but this had to be shared.

I was happy to download this because I wanted to see what our lovely President had to say and I wanted to get some r e a l news.
